overview: Fernando Blanco Founded Anime Kida in 2009. He attended Florida International University and graduated as a Computer Engineer. Originally, he made this website to promote the Graphic novel made by his sister. Later, the website evolved into an anime website. His sole role in the website involves coming up with methods of uploading content faster. He also does all the CEO for the website. He is also in charge of designing the general look of the website. He is always trying to harmonize the look of the website with speed. He tries hard to make an efficient website that inspires confidence. This is no easy job.
